job.title: Senior Software Engineer (100% Remote)
job.description:
Senior Software Engineer needed for a consulting company providing business-to-technology lifecycle support!

Title: Senior Software Engineer

Location: Washington, DC or Remote

Salary: $120,000 - $140,000

Requirements: JavaScript, Python, SQL

As a Senior Software Engineer, this individual will be responsible for supporting a client in the music industry. We have re-architected a core enterprise software platform to support managing digital performance rights. You will be responsible for leading software strategy and development.

What You Will Be Doing
  • Develop high-quality software design and architecture
  • Software Product Design
  • Software Product Implementation
  • Identify, prioritize and execute tasks in the software development life cycle
What You Need for this Position
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, engineering discipline, or equivalent experience
  • 3+ years of professional experience in software development
You Should Know Some Of The Following
  • JavaScript
  • JS Frameworks (Angular, React, Vue, Node)
  • Python
  • Django/Flask
  • SQL/PostgreSQL
  • AWS
What's In It for You
  • Competitive base salary and overall compensation package
  • 100% company paid medical, vision, and dental insurance (including family)
  • 100% company paid employee life, short-term and long- term disability
  • 3% annual company contribution to 401(k)
  • Generous Paid time off (PTO)
  • 10 training days per year
  • Public Transit Reimbursement
  • Apply directly to this job opening here!
or
  • E-mail directly for more information to josh.sanchez@CyberCoders.com
Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Josh.Sanchez@CyberCoders.com
  • Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JS22-1649082 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Josh Sanchez - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
